item.description:
This year (2022) is going to see my journal/logâ€™s 10th anniversary and 100th notebook. After many attempts to write this up, Iâ€™m just going to disgorge it all. This article is long and rambling and I make no apology for it.

Source: My Notebook System ... [link]
Satisfaction thatâ€™s one minute more: [link]

Liked a thought by Noah Garfinkelâ†’

One reason I still have trouble believing crypto currency is money is that there arenâ€™t commercials for money. [link]
A Lesson in Staying Positive: [link]
Porting Hugo theme to [link]: https://t.co/3mfZpYbKng

I find the story of Douglas Corrigan pretty fascinating and inspiring. Sometimes the wrong way is the right way. All that matters is your intention and peopleâ€™s perception.

Having flown his nine year-old, $900 Curtiss Robin to New York, Corrigan ... [link]
Valuation brought by stocks is always flimsy. It never represents the real worth of a company. Applicable to all the companies in top 10 even now. [link]
Who knew MySpace is still active to decline? I always thought it was shuttered long time back. [link]

I am on a #30day challenge of not accessing any of the social timelines and have signed out from them in all my browsers. I will continue to post to my blog, and hence cross-post to Twitter. But to aid myself to stay away from timeline, I wonâ€™t access ... [link]

My todayâ€™s Wordle play was so crazy. I cracked it in the first round and still I needed four more. Because unlike yesterday, todayâ€™s was an extremely common word. ğŸŸ¨â¬›â¬›ğŸŸ¨ğŸŸ© ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©â¬›ğŸŸ© ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©â¬›ğŸŸ© ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©â¬›ğŸŸ© ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ©ğŸŸ© [link]
I loved the clouds floating in the vivid skies today. They crowded throughout all at once. And dispersed just as swiftly, without much drama. [link]
Todayâ€™s Wordle was tricky. I didnâ€™t know such a word exist. I tried it because it sounded right. Not all words are so common afterall.
Love is knowing your partner better than you know yourself! It was only yesterday when I quipped that am like Po. And I had this gift waiting for me. [link] https://t.co/OQ5wDO1eEl
Why [link] works for me?: https://t.co/rFR4dzLAWJ

I am observing huge performance improvements with blogs hosted at [link] recently. I click publish and the post is available both on my blog and the timeline. Wasnâ€™t the case earlier. @manton looks to have done some magic to the backend. If so, kudos!

I am like Po from Kung Fu Panda, I eat when I am upset. Or even nervous. All curated habits go down the drain. I intend, however, to get back to some form of routine again. The tired, hectic last few weeks have left me exhausted. Made me Po.
@NutshellWriter Lol! I've never played the easy mode then â€” I have unnecessarily been judging myself ğŸ˜œ

I didnâ€™t know Wordle has a â€œHardâ€ mode where â€œany revealed hints must be used in subsequent guessesâ€. But even without the mode turned on, thatâ€™s how I have been playing this game. Why would you do it any other way?
A Stranger on the Wheels: [link]

I am exited by the Jurassic World Dominion trailer, mainly by the star cast from the original one. As I saw more, I wished the trailer ended with a screen that read â€œDirected by Steven Spielbergâ€. ğŸ¥ [link]

I didnâ€™t know todayâ€™s wordle word was a word. I knew the word, but I didnâ€™t know it as a word. I canâ€™t possibly have spoilt anything. Iâ€™ve read what Iâ€™ve written here twice now. But what Iâ€™ve written here wonâ€™t make sense if I didnâ€™t know what itâ€™s supposed to mean. Makes sense?

I like the new Galaxy S22 devices, especially the non-Ultra ones. If the rumour that Samsung might finally launch with Snapdragon processor in India is true, I might seriously consider the non-plus variant. Plus the downslide that OnePlus is on makes this decision a lot easier.

I now have 3 posts in draft, unpublished, because Iâ€™m not yet satisfied. Another reason why Iâ€™ve more micro posts than the long-form ones. I feel a sense of attachment to the stuff I post on my blog. The stuff I wrote on Twitter and other platform can get lost. Literally.
Letters from Tikwadi â€“ A Story in Post: [link]

I have released an upgrade 1.0.4 to the Paper theme today. There are no visible changes, just fixes for a few issues that I have observed or have been reported to me. Mainly with archive page, custom CSS and plugin CSS & files. Let me know if you ... [link]
